title: Are CS 540 or CS 577 lectures recorded ?
body: I'm enrolled in both at the same time. Need to figure out how I'm gonna manage it.
comments: If you're in the 540 that meets in 1240 CS, email the instructor (or just DM me here, whatever) and we can work something out.
Not sure if Shuchi is teaching but she used to record all her lectures when I was taking her class a year ago
